thread.title: Subscribe to Food & Travel magazine for just £1 each for the first two issues
thread.title_full: Subscribe to Food & Travel magazine for just £1 each for the first two issues - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Subscribe to Food & Travel magazine for just £1 each for the first two issues
text: Telegraph readers can subscribe to Food & Travel magazine for just £1 each for the first two issues.* In Food and Travel magazine you’ll find stunning images, inspirational stories and all the latest information about your two favourite things in life. Each issue, their best writers search the globe for exciting destinations, the latest restaurants and the finest cuisines, whisking you away on a culinary voyage. The magazine also features scores of delicious recipes, ensuring that your journey doesn’t end the moment you arrive home. If you subscribe, you will also receive an added bonus of two free tickets to The Chocolate Show London and Cruise Show, at either Birmingham, Glasgow or Manchester. You will also have the opportunity to win two tickets to Food & Travel's prestigious annual Reader Awards gala dinner, on September 14, 2015 at The Royal Automobile Club, Pall Mall, where Michelin-starred chefs Jason Atherton, Shaun Rankin and Robert Ortiz will be cooking up a storm. How to Claim To claim this offer, click here (https://www.fastdd.co.uk/platinum/start.php?c=Food-and-Travel-Magazine) Terms and Conditions The price will then increase to the discounted rate of £19.50 every six months. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
